draw_tree2d.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 ! ======================
00003 !
00004 !   DRAW_TREE2D
00005 !
00006 !   Output particles and tree structure for processing
00007 !   by GLE 
00008 !
00009 ! ======================
00010 
00011 subroutine draw_tree2d(xl,yl)
00012 
00013 
00014   use treevars
00015 
00016   implicit none
00017 
00018   real, intent(in) :: xl,yl
00019   integer*8 :: key_twig(ntwig), key_leaf(nleaf)
00020 
00021   integer, dimension(ntwig) :: level_twig, node_twig, owner_twig       ! twig-nodes
00022   integer, dimension(nleaf) :: level_leaf, plist_leaf, ind_leaf, owner_leaf       ! leaf-nodes
00023 
00024   character(30) :: cfile
00025   character(1) :: csnap
00026   character(3) :: cme
00027   character(7), parameter :: colors(0:9) = (/"orange ", "cyan   ", "magenta", "blue   ", "green  ", &
00028        "red    ","yellow ","grey20 ","violet ","brown  "/) 
00029 
00030 
00031   integer :: i, ip, j, ilev, isnap, ibt, ix, iy, nbits
00032   real :: s, xt, yt
00033 
00034 
00035   csnap=achar(mod(me,10)+48)
00036 
00037 
00038   !  Header file written out by root PE: does box and includes particle O/P from all PEs
00039   if ( me==0 ) then
00040      cfile="tree2d.gle"
00041      write (ipefile,'(a)') cfile
00042      open(60,file=cfile)
00043 
00044      !  initialise graphics filter
00045 
00046      write (60,'(a,3(/a),2(/a,2f13.4))') &
00047           'size 18 18' &
00048           , 'set font rm' &
00049           , 'set lwidth 0.05 lstyle 1' &
00050           , 'psize=0.04' &
00051           , 'begin scale ',15./boxsize,15./boxsize &
00052           , 'begin translate ',.01*boxsize,.01*yl
00053 
00054      write (60,'(a/a,2f13.4)') 'amove 0 0','box ',boxsize,yl
00055 
00056      do i=0, num_pe-1
00057         cme = achar(i/100+48) // achar(i/10+48) // achar(mod(i,10)+48)  ! Convert 3-digit PE number into character string
00058         cfile="tree_"//cme//".gle"
00059         write (60,'(2a)') 'include ',cfile
00060      end do
00061      write (60,'(a/a)') 'end translate','end scale'
00062      close(60)
00063 
00064   endif
00065 
00066 
00067   !  Now do particles and boxes belonging to each processor domain
00068 
00069   cme = achar(me/100+48) // achar(me/10+48) // achar(mod(me,10)+48)  ! Convert 3-digit PE number into character string
00070   cfile="tree_"//cme//".gle"
00071   open (60,file=cfile) 
00072 
00073   ! get keys of twig nodes from hash table
00074   key_twig = pack(htable%key,mask=htable%node<0)
00075 
00076   ! get levels of twigs
00077   level_twig = log( 1.*key_twig )/log(8.)
00078   node_twig = pack(htable%node,mask=htable%node<0)         ! twig index
00079   owner_twig = pack(htable%owner,mask=htable%node<0)         ! twig owner
00080 
00081 
00082 
00083   do j=2,ntwig
00084      write (60,'(a/a,a7)') 'set hei .02','set color ',colors( mod(owner_twig(j),10) )
00085      ! get coords from keys
00086      nbits = level_twig(j)
00087      ix = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_twig(j),3*i,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00088      iy = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_twig(j),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00089  
00090      s = boxsize/2**(level_twig(j))          !  box length
00091      xt=ix*s + xmin
00092      yt=iy*s + ymin
00093      write (60,'(a)') 'set color black'
00094      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00095      if (owner_twig(j) == me) then
00096         write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'box ',s,s
00097      else
00098         write (60,'(a,2f13.4,2a)') 'box ',s,s,' fill ',colors( mod(owner_twig(j),10) )
00099      endif
00100 
00101      !        write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xcoc( node_twig(j) ),ycoc( node_twig(j) )        ! Centre of charge of twig node
00102      !         write (60,'(a,f10.5,a)') 'circle ',.005*sqrt(abs_charge( node_twig(j) )),' fill grey'
00103      !        write (60,'(a)') 'set hei 0.01'
00104      !
00105   !   write (60,'(a)') 'set color black'
00106  !    write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt+s/2,yt+s/2
00107 !     write (60,'(a,i6)') 'text ',key_twig(j)         ! write out key
00108 
00109   end do
00110 
00111 
00112 
00113   ! get keys of leaf nodes from hash table
00114   key_leaf(1:nleaf) = pack(htable%key,mask=htable%node>0)
00115   ind_leaf(1:nleaf) = pack(htable%node,mask=htable%node>0)         ! particle index
00116   owner_leaf(1:nleaf) = pack(htable%owner,mask=htable%node>0)         ! leaf owner
00117   plist_leaf(1:nleaf) = pack(htable%childcode,mask=htable%node>0)   ! particle label
00118 
00119   ! get levels of leaves
00120   level_leaf(1:nleaf) = log(1.*key_leaf(1:nleaf))/log(8.)
00121 
00122 
00123   do j=1,nleaf
00124      ! get box coords from keys
00125      nbits = level_leaf(j)    ! # bits per ordinate
00126      ix = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_leaf(j),3*i,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00127      iy = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_leaf(j),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00128 
00129      s = boxsize/2**(level_leaf(j))          !  box length
00130      xt=ix*s + xmin
00131      yt=iy*s + ymin
00132 !         write (60,'(a,a)') 'set color ',colors( mod(owner_leaf(j),10) )
00133      ! keys
00134      !     write (60,'(a)') 'set hei 0.01'
00135     write (60,'(a)') 'set color black'
00136 
00137      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00138      if (owner_leaf(j) == me) then
00139         write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'box ',s,s
00140      else
00141         write (60,'(a,2f13.4,2a)') 'box ',s,s,' fill ',colors( mod(owner_leaf(j),10) )
00142  !       write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt+s/2,yt+s/2
00143 !        write (60,'(a,i6)') 'text ',key_leaf(j)
00144      endif
00145      !     write (60,'(a/a)') 'set color green','set lwidth .002'
00146      !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00147      !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'circle .02'
00148 
00149 
00150   end do
00151 
00152 
00153 
00154   do i=1,npp
00155      write (60,'(a,a)') 'set color ',colors( mod(me,8) )
00156 
00157      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',x(i),y(i)
00158      write (60,'(2a)') 'circle psize fill ',colors( mod(me,8))
00159 !     write (60,'(2a)') 'circle psize fill ','black'
00160   end do
00161 
00162 
00163   ! map of interleaved bits 
00164 
00165   ilev = nlev
00166   s = boxsize/2**(ilev)          !  box length
00167   ! recover box coordinates of parents
00168   ibt = nlev-ilev           ! bit shift factor (0=particle node, nlev-1 = root)
00169   do j = 1,npp
00170      ix = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( ishft( pekey(j),-2*ibt ),2*i,1 ), i=0,nbits-2-ibt) /) )
00171      iy = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( ishft( pekey(j),-2*ibt ),2*i+1,1 ), i=0,nbits-2-ibt) /) )
00172   end do
00173 
00174 
00175   ! first point
00176   xt=x(1)
00177   yt=y(1)
00178 !    write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00179 !     write (60,'(a,a)') 'set color ',colors( mod(me,8) )
00180  !    write (60,'(a,a)') 'set lwidth 0.03'
00181 
00182   do ip = 2,npp
00183      xt=x(ip)
00184      yt=y(ip)
00185  !    write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'aline ',xt,yt
00186   end do
00187 
00188   !  boundary links
00189   if (me /= num_pe-1) then
00190      !     write (60,'(a)') 'set color grey50'
00191      !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'aline ',x(npp+1),y(npp+1)
00192   endif
00193 
00194 
00195 
00196   close(60)
00197 
00198 end subroutine draw_tree2d
